translations: n.便装（等于 deshabille）；随便；混乱

phrs.translation: 便装, 便服, 穿着随便的状况

sentences.sentence: Male guest, come on whole it is better still to say, appear this month an employee wears dishabille to enter business area, undertake fining handling on the spot.
sentences.translation: 男宾，在整体上来说还是较好，在本月出现一名员工穿便装进入营业区，当场进行罚款处理。
